ow.messaging での Message の使用
 

Message を返す ow.messaging のメソッド
static Message Message.decode(java.nio.ByteBuffer buf)
          Convert a ByteBuffer to a Message.
static Message Message.decode(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel in)
          This an utility method which reads a Message from the given input stream.
static Message Message.decode(java.nio.channels.SocketChannel in, long timeout)
          This an utility method which reads a Message from the given input stream.
 Message MessageHandler.process(Message msg)
          Process the given message.
 Message MessageSender.sendAndReceive(MessagingAddress dest, Message msg)
          Send the given message, wait for a message and receive it.
 

Message 型の引数を持つ型を返す ow.messaging のメソッド
static java.lang.Class<? extends Message> MessageDirectory.getClassByTag(int tag)
           
 

Message 型のパラメータを持つ ow.messaging のメソッド
 void ExtendedMessageHandler.postProcess(Message msg)
          Post-process the given message after returning the returned value from MessageHandler#process.
 Message MessageHandler.process(Message msg)
          Process the given message.
 void MessageSender.send(MessagingAddress dest, Message msg)
          Send the given message one-way.
 Message MessageSender.sendAndReceive(MessagingAddress dest, Message msg)
          Send the given message, wait for a message and receive it.
